page.title: 02LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN CAPEL
page.content: {ACTIVITIES TAKE PLACE IN 5 PRINCIPAL {BUILDINGS - THE COMMUNITY CENTRE, THE {SCOUT HUT AND ST. LUKE'S CHURCH FIVE {OAK GREEN, THE PRIMARY SCHOOL AND THE {GOLDSMID HALL TUDELEY.}THERE ARE CUBS, BROWNIES,SCOUTS,GUIDES,VENTURE SCOUTS, JUDO,DANCING,BADMINTON,A YOUTH CLUB AND PLAYGROUP FOR YOUNG PEOPLE. ADULTS ENJOY BADMINTON,SPORTS AND SOCIAL CLUB EVENTS AND OUTINGS,THE W.I.,GARDENERS' SOCIETY AND COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION ACTIVITIES.MANY SPORTS ARE ORGANISED BY LOCAL PUBS - TUG O' WAR, DARTS ETC. CAPEL COUNTRY FRIENDS CATERS FOR THE ELDERLY WITH REGULAR MEETINGS AND OUTINGS. THE PRIMARY SCHOOL P.A. RUNS DANCES AND OTHER EVENTS AND CHURCHES ALSO HAVE SOCIAL ACTIVITIES. {POPULAR ANNUAL EVENTS }- CHRISTMAS DINNER & ENTERTAINMENT FOR PENSIONERS, MAY FESTIVAL,GARDENERS' SHOW,OX ROAST, SCHOOL SWIMMING GALA & MUSICAL EVENING
